story.label: Our Story
story.title: Two Worlds, One Heart
story.paragraph1: From the vibrant streets of Mexico City to the cobbled squares of Brussels, our story is a map of two cultures finding a home in one another.
story.paragraph2: We chose France as our gathering place—a neutral ground of beauty and wine—to celebrate the blending of our families and the beginning of our forever.

timeline.label: Our Journey
timeline.title: How We Got Here
timeline.subtitle: From chance encounter to forever, these are the moments that brought us together.

met.title: The First Hello
met.description: A chance meeting that would change everything. What started as a casual introduction became the beginning of our story.

firstDate.title: The First Date
firstDate.description: Coffee turned into dinner, dinner turned into a walk through the city, and we knew this was something special.

moved.title: Building Our Home
moved.description: We took the leap and moved in together, blending our lives, cultures, and collections of books.

engaged.title: The Proposal
engaged.description: Under a sky full of stars, with trembling hands and a full heart, the question was asked and answered with joy.

wedding.title: The Wedding
wedding.description: Where our two families become one, in the heart of Burgundy.
